net.semanticmetadata.lire.searchers.custom

Class SingleNddCeddImageSearcher

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.semanticmetadata.lire.searchers.AbstractImageSearcher
      • net.semanticmetadata.lire.searchers.custom.SingleNddCeddImageSearcher
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ImageSearcher

    public class SingleNddCeddImageSearcher
extends AbstractImageSearcher
    A ImageSearcher that retrieves just the first result, caches the whole index and optimizes search time by bundling searches. Please note that as soon as the instance is created, changes in the index are not reflected.
    Author:
    Mathias Lux, mathias@juggle.at

    • Constructor Detail

      • SingleNddCeddImageSearcher

        public SingleNddCeddImageSearcher(org.apache.lucene.index.IndexReader reader)
        Creates a new ImageSearcher for searching just one single image based on CEDD from a RAM cached data set.
        Parameters:
        reader - the index reader pointing to the index. It will be cached first, so changes will not be reflected in this instance.

      • SingleNddCeddImageSearcher

        public SingleNddCeddImageSearcher(org.apache.lucene.index.IndexReader reader,
                                  boolean approximate)
        Creates a new ImageSearcher for searching just one single image based on CEDD from a RAM cached data set. Set approximate to true if you want to speed up search and loose accuracy.
        Parameters:
        reader - the index reader pointing to the index. It will be cached first, so changes will not be reflected in this instance.
        approximate - set to true if you want to trade accuracy to speed, setting to true is faster (~ double speed), but less accurate

      • SingleNddCeddImageSearcher
